definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: This is a recording. Please leave a message after the beep. Thank you.
sentences.chinese: 请你在哔一声之后留低你的口信啦。

sentences.english: Please start your message after the tone.
sentences.chinese: 请在哔声响后开始留话。

sentences.english: The logs were burning briskly in the fire.
sentences.chinese: 木柴在火中哔哔剥剥烧的正旺。

sentences.english: The logs were burning briskly in the fire.
sentences.chinese: 木柴在火中哔哔剥剥烧的正旺。

sentences.english: Suddenly, the cell phone beeps when its signal starts to die.
sentences.chinese: 突然，手机接收不到信号而发出了“哔”的一声。

sentences.english: My name is Bebe. Im from HongKong.
sentences.chinese: 我个名叫哔哔，我系香港银。

sentences.english: My name is Bebe. Im from HongKong.
sentences.chinese: 我个名叫哔哔，我系香港银。

sentences.english: I can’t stand the beeping sound.
sentences.chinese: 我真受不了那种哔哔的响声。

sentences.english: I can’t stand the beeping sound.
sentences.chinese: 我真受不了那种哔哔的响声。

sentences.english: After the beep you should write down the correct answer on the sheet .
sentences.chinese: 听到的哔的一声后，你要在答题卡上写下正确的答案。

sentences.english: This kettle whistles when it boils.
sentences.chinese: 这水壶在水开时会哔哔作响。

sentences.english: This kettle whistles when it boils.
sentences.chinese: 这水壶在水开时会哔哔作响。

sentences.english: Does the computer beep on power-up?
sentences.chinese: 电脑开机时发出“哔”的响声吗？

sentences.english: Forklifts beeped, moving portable toilets into position.
sentences.chinese: 哔哔作响的叉车把移动厕所摆放到位。

sentences.english: Forklifts beeped, moving portable toilets into position.
sentences.chinese: 哔哔作响的叉车把移动厕所摆放到位。

definition: (onom.) sound of dripping water, a ticking clock etc
(onom.) to squeak (of mice)/to chirp or peep (of small birds)
child's buttocks (esp. Cantonese)/(onom.) crack, slap, clap, clatter etc
(onom.) for the sound of a bird, an empty stomach etc
(onom.) scraping sound/ripping of fabric/screeching of tires
